quotes.quote: It's terrible to lose your brain and your power to be conscious or in the moment.
Terrible is the temptation to be good.
It is terrible to speak well and be wrong.
Terrible times breed terrible things, my lord.
What a terrible thing it is to botch a farewell.
It is a terrible thing to see and have no vision.
What a terrible thing it is to lose one's mind...
There is a terrible weight in all kinds of beauty
Two terrible behaviors don't make a good behavior.
What terrible tragedies realism inflicts on people.
Terrible is the fight put up by the senses. Fight bravely! Conquer them you must.
It's a terrible waste to be happy and not notice it.
Everything terrible is something that needs our love.
What a terrible era in which idiots govern the blind.
Nothing is more terrible than activity without insight.
There are much more terrible things than physical injury.
How terrible it is to be woman...but only because of men.
It's terrible the way words get attached to you like barnacles.
There is a terrible emptiness in me, an indifference that hurts.
The terrible thing about the quest for truth is that you find it.
He was so terrible that he was no longer terrible, only dehumanized.
It's a terrible thing wishing that it can be someone else's tragedy.
How terrible is wisdom, when it brings no profit to the man that's wise
There is no more terrible fate for a comedian than to be taken seriously.
It's a terrible thing to be lonesome, especially in the middle of a crowd.
There are three terrible ages of childhood - 1 to 10, 10 to 20, and 20 to 30.
Yes, terrible things happen, but sometimes those terrible things- they save you.
Nothing is terrible except fear itself.
The most terrible of all things is terror.
We all make terrible mistakes in our lives.
